PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-11282023-11-09PMO
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisReappointment of MURRAY SEGAL of Toronto, Ontario, as a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as an ad hoc provincial member of the Independent Advisory Board for Senate Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of MURRAY SEGAL of Toronto, Ontario, as a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as an ad hoc provincial member of the Independent Advisory Board for Senate Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years.
